languages.text: {n}Владайм скупо улыбается.{/n} "Старые привычки никогда не уходят. Признаюсь, совсем не скучал по молодым денькам, но вновь оказаться на линии огня... Это бодрит".
{n}Vladaym smiles tersely.{/n} "Old habits die hard. I'll admit, I wasn't exactly yearning for the days of my youth, but to find myself in the line of fire again is... invigorating."
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм скупо улыбается.{/n} "Старые привычки никогда не уходят. Признаюсь, совсем не скучал по молодым денькам, но вновь оказаться на линии огня... Это бодрит".

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆淡淡一笑。{/n}“积习难改啊。我得承认，虽然我不怎么怀念年轻时的日子，但当我再次亲身参加战斗的时候，这种感觉……让我容光焕发。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles tersely.{/n} "Old habits die hard. I'll admit, I wasn't exactly yearning for the days of my youth, but to find myself in the line of fire again is... invigorating."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆淡淡一笑。{/n}“积习难改啊。我得承认，虽然我不怎么怀念年轻时的日子，但当我再次亲身参加战斗的时候，这种感觉……令我兴奋不已。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは素っ気なく笑う。{/n}「古い習慣はなかなか消えない。青春時代を懐かしいと思った事はないが、再び戦線に立つとなると…燃えてくるぜ」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles tersely.{/n} "Old habits die hard. I'll admit, I wasn't exactly yearning for the days of my youth, but to find myself in the line of fire again is... invigorating."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは素っ気なく笑う。{/n}「古い習慣はなかなか消えない。青春時代を懐かしいと思った事はないが、再び戦線に立つとなると…燃えてくるぜ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym sonríe secamente.{/n} «Cuesta quitarse las viejas costumbres. Admito que no echaba de menos los días de mi juventud, pero encontrarme de nuevo en la línea de fuego es... estimulante».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles tersely.{/n} "Old habits die hard. I'll admit, I wasn't exactly yearning for the days of my youth, but to find myself in the line of fire again is... invigorating."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym sonríe secamente.{/n} «Los viejos hábitos nunca desaparecen. Admito que no echaba de menos los días de mi juventud, pero encontrarme de nuevo en la línea de fuego es... estimulante».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym lächelt angespannt.{/n} "Alte Gewohnheiten legt man nicht ab. Ich muss zugeben, dass ich die Tage meiner Jugend nicht unbedingt vermisst habe, aber nun wieder in der Schusslinie zu stehen, ist ... belebend."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles tersely.{/n} "Old habits die hard. I'll admit, I wasn't exactly yearning for the days of my youth, but to find myself in the line of fire again is... invigorating."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym lächelt angespannt.{/n} "Alte Gewohnheiten legt man nicht ab. Ich muss zugeben, dass ich die Tage meiner Jugend nicht unbedingt vermisst habe, aber nun wieder in der Schusslinie zu stehen, ist ... belebend."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym vous adresse un sourire laconique.{/n} « Les vieilles habitudes ont la vie dure. Les frasques de ma jeunesse ne me manquent pas vraiment, mais j'avoue qu'il est... revigorant de me trouver à nouveau dans la ligne de mire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles tersely.{/n} "Old habits die hard. I'll admit, I wasn't exactly yearning for the days of my youth, but to find myself in the line of fire again is... invigorating."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym vous adresse un sourire laconique.{/n} « Les vieilles habitudes ont la vie dure. Les frasques de ma jeunesse ne me manquent pas vraiment, mais j'avoue qu'il est... revigorant de me trouver à nouveau dans la ligne de mire. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym gergince gülümsüyor.{/n} "Huylu huyundan vazgeçmezmiş. Ne yalan söyleyeyim, gençliğimi pek de mumla aramıyordum ama tekrar namlu ucuna düşmek... Heyecan veriyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym smiles tersely.{/n} "Old habits die hard. I'll admit, I wasn't exactly yearning for the days of my youth, but to find myself in the line of fire again is... invigorating."
